name: Street Clean TD
description:
Protect the streets from the living trash.

You have just arrived in the city to buy materials, only to see that it has been invaded by living trash.



Clean Street TD is a strategy game in which you have to defend the sewers from different types of garbage, build cleaning turrets which will help you defeat all your enemies, but carefully choose which upgrades you will buy, since each turret has a limit of two improvements.

Torretas

Built with the materials you have on hand, although they do not have the best technology, they are everyone's best hope to stop the threat of living trash.

Enemigos

Experiments created by a mad scientist made garbage come to life and now they seek to cover all the sewers to flood the city.


  • Each turret can choose two of four upgrades. Think about which one you'll need.

  • Enemies with unique abilities.

  • Purchase permanent upgrades in the store

  • An extra difficulty that you can customize
